hero.subtitle:
We build AI-powered software on top of the systems you already use.
Our goal is to eliminate inefficiencies and unlock powerful leverage
for your company's growth.

about.title: Don't let your competitors get ahead.
about.description: From AI Agents that automatically generate reports and optimize your planning to voice technology that keeps your CRM up-to-date - efficiency is becoming increasingly important today. We make sure you don't miss the train.

spotlight.title: FEATURED
spotlight.description: Your salespeople send a WhatsApp voice message with their client visit details - client name, quote amount, follow-up appointments - and everything is automatically placed in the right place in your CRM of choice. This plug & play tool integrates with any CRM and takes only 3 minutes to install. More time for clients, less time on administration.

about.tagline: Your team deserves better tools. We build them.

process.title: Our Proven Process
process.subtitle: A structured approach that ensures results

1.title: Discovery
1.subtitle: Analyze & Understand
1.description: We analyze your current situation and identify core challenges.
1.usecase: A law firm struggles with finding legal information across multiple systems.

2.title: Design
2.subtitle: Plan & Architect
2.description: We design a custom solution that perfectly fits your needs.
2.usecase: We propose an AI knowledge base for searchable legal documents.

3.title: Develop
3.subtitle: Build & Integrate
3.description: Our team builds your solution with modern technologies.
3.usecase: We develop a RAG system with intuitive chat interface.

4.title: Test
4.subtitle: Validate & Optimize
4.description: Extensive testing ensures perfect functionality before launch.
4.usecase: We test accuracy and security with real legal cases.

5.title: Launch
5.subtitle: Deploy & Support
5.description: We launch your solution and provide ongoing support.
5.usecase: System launches with training and performance monitoring.

caseStudy.title: Success Story
caseStudy.subtitle: Legal Knowledge Management System
caseStudy.challenge: Law firm with 120+ attorneys struggling with document retrieval across 15+ systems, consuming 4 hours daily per attorney.
caseStudy.solution: AI-powered unified knowledge base with natural language search and intelligent document indexing.
